name: Mikrotik Monitoring
description: This plugin is created to monitor Mikrotik Router from PHPNuxBill and its features include: Router System Information, Interface Monitoring, Online Hotspot Users, Online PPPoE Users. e.t.c
author: Focuslinkstech

name: Mikrotik Import
description: Import existing Mikrotik Hotspot Package and User to PHPNuxBill. This script will import Users and Profiles, but will not add active packages to user.
author: ibnux

name: Internet Speed Test
description: Speedtest plugin is designed to provide users with an easy and efficient way to measure their internet connection speed directly through the PHPNuxBill interface.
author: Focuslinkstech

name: Tripay View Payment
description: Dengan Plugin ini, Pembeli tidak akan diarahkan ke Web Tripay, instruksi pembayaran akan langsung ditampilkan.
author: ibnux

name: Port Tester
description: Check if your server block some port.
author: ibnux

name: System Information
description: The plugin is used to monitor system or server performance, check running services
author: Focuslinkstech

name: Extended Database Backup and Restore
description: This Plugin is used to create database backup, restore, and download, but it is still in development, it has a lot of bugs and needs to be fixed, you can pull a request if errors or bugs, and it will be maintained from time to time
author: Focuslinkstech

name: Radius online user viewer
description: To see whos online, and can disconect the user

name: Radius NAS Online Offline Status Checker
description: Radius NAS Status Plugin to Check Status About NAS Online / Offline

name: Whatsapp Gateway
description: Whatsapp Gateway Client Multiple Phone Number, random send.
author: ibnux

name: IPDR Plugin | Paid Plugin
description: Internet Protocol Detail Record (IPDR) to log Customer activity, Works with Hotspot, PPPOE, and radius. To download this, you need to setup Github Authentication
author: ibnux

name: Hotspot System | Paid Plugin
description: Phpnuxbill Hotspot System Plugin is a powerful and versatile tool for managing and automating hotspot networks. It is designed to be integrated with the Phpnuxbill billing and customer management platform, providing a comprehensive solution for small and medium-sized businesses that offer public internet access.
author: Focuslinkstech

name: Support Ticket System | Paid Plugin
description: The Phpnuxbill Plugin Support Ticket is a powerful and versatile plugin designed to enhance customer support and streamline ticket management within your Phpnuxbill environment. This plugin provides a seamless and efficient way to handle customer inquiries, technical issues, and other support-related matters.
author: Focuslinkstech

name: User Data Usage Plugin
description: The User Data Usage Plugin is a feature for the Phpnuxbill for both user and admin , any suggestions just send it on whatsapp +249912740956.

name: Twilio-Plugin | Paid Plugin
description: Using Twillio as Gateway to send SMS or Whatsapp
